FunctionOracle.name: deducir_forma_pago
FunctionOracle.source: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION deducir_forma_pago(<br/> tarjeta IN VARCHAR <br/>)<br/>RETURN VARCHAR2 DETERMINISTIC AS<br/>BEGIN<br/> IF tarjeta IS NOT NULL THEN<br/> RETURN 'tarjeta';<br/> ELSE<br/> RETURN 'metalico';<br/> END IF;<br/>END deducir_forma_pago;
